Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Apart from this cytostatic effect , temsirolimus had an antiangiogenic effect with decrease of tumor microvessel density and of VEGF expression .

| Disease |

| None identified in this paragraph |

The paragraph mentions the effects of temsirolimus on tumor microvessel density and VEGF expression, but it does not explicitly state that these are diseases. "Tumor microvessel density" refers to the number of blood vessels in a tumor, while "VEGF expression" refers to the presence and level of the vascular endothelial growth factor in a tissue or cell. These are not diseases, but rather biological markers or conditions associated with certain diseases.
